name: Bean Boi - Browser Version
description:
Bean Boi is a challenging and cute casual arcade game. double jump, dash and soar through the skies with your jetpack to collect beans. The game is also available for download on PC here

I will continue working on this together with my graphics artist Me.Artzz. Posting hoping it can gain some traction as we keep working on it. More updates to come!

Perfectly playable with Gamepad, all you have to do is plug it in.

NOTE: Having a Gamepad plugged in changes how the dash works. If you plan on playing on Keyboard&Mouse, it is recommended that you unplug any Gamepads.

ActionsKeyboard & MouseGamepadMove:
WASDLeft JoystickJump:SpaceButton SouthDash:Left clickButton EastJetpackHold Right clickHold Button North
